title: fried pork fillet with prune and Armagnac sauce and sautéed potatoes
ingredients: 1 pork tenderloin fillet, cut into 1cm/0.5in-thick slices
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 jar prunes in Armagnac (alternatively you can buy semi-dried prunes and soak them in Armagnac overnight), stones removed and roughly chopped
